author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Procredit Holding Profit From Continuing Operations At EUR 46.6 Mln
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - PROCREDIT HOLDING AG & CO KGAA :
* PROFIT FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS, AT EUR 46.6 MILLION IN 2017 (2016: EUR 47 MILLION)
* IN 2018, GROSS LOAN PORTFOLIO EXPECTED TO GROW BY 12-15% AND ROAE TO 7.5-8.5%
* PROFIT OF EUR 48.1 MILLION IN 2017, WHICH WAS LOWER THAN THAT OF PREVIOUS YEAR (2016: EUR 61 MILLION)
* COMMON EQUITY TIER 1 CAPITAL RATIO (CET1 FULLY LOADED) WAS 13.7% AS AT 31 DECEMBER 2017 (2016: 12.5%) Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
